title: Laidback Bahamas Beachside Villa Glamour on Sparkling Emerald Bay
description: Embrace brilliant Bahamas luxury on the iconic Great Exuma island with a family-friendly stay at Grand Isle Resort & Residences, perfectly set overlooking the azure waters and lush tropical greenery of Emerald Bay. Just a short boat ride from the world-famous swimming pigs on Big Major Cay, itâ€™s perfectly positioned for an unforgettable Bahamas break - practice your putts on the resort's championship golf course or celebrate local tastes and traditions at al fresco favourite Palapa.
